name: Wiimms Mario Kart Fun 2017-12
overview: This new release of MKW-Fun features 34 all new tracks and multiple updates. Therefor 34 established tracks had to make way for the new ones. The tracks in MKW-Fun have been drawn by lot this time and removed tracks will be in the draw pot with an increased chance next time. This way there will be no more permanent fare-wells.
